title: Regularisation by Hamiltonian extension
abstract:
We consider the Kepler potential and its relatives $q\mapsto
-\|q\|^{-2(1-1/n)}$, $n\in\mathbb{N}$ in arbitrary dimension $d$. We derive a
unique real-analytic symplectic extension of phase space on which the
Hamiltonian flow is complete and still real-analytic.
